sentence.Network_en: He was sinking into the Slough of Despond.
sentence.Network_cn: 他那时正陷入极度沮丧的状态。

sentence.Network_en: He saved her from the slough of despond.
sentence.Network_cn: 他把她从绝望的深渊中拯救了出来.

sentence.Network_en: She could have been trying to encourage a patient who threatened to despond.
sentence.Network_cn: 她像是在鼓励一位眼看就要垂头丧气的病人.

PerfectNetExp.abs: Though he had failed , he did not despond ., 他虽然失败了却没有悲观失望.
At that time the country was in the slough despond ., 当时该国陷入深深的绝望之中.
despoil 破坏, despond 德蓬, despond 失去勇气

list.abs: She chose finally got rid of her despondent mood through the psychological consultation ., 最终她选择了通过心理咨询来摆脱自己的抑郁情绪.
paraplegina patient anxious despondent condition diagnosis and countermeasure research ., 截瘫病人焦虑抑郁状态调查分析与对策研究.
the dual influence of despondent making and christ culture on gadfly ., 抑郁气质和基督文化对牛虻的双重影响.

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 17th cent.: from Latin despondere 'give up, abandon', from de- 'away' + spondere 'to promise'. The word was originally used as a noun in Slough of Ddespond

means.word_mean: 1. lose confidence or hope; become dejected;

sentences.sentence: "The supporters of the Presidential candidate desponded when they learned the early results of the election"

auth_sentence.content: Both are alienated by veering between over-enthusiasm and despond.
auth_sentence.res_content: Both are alienated by veering between over-enthusiasm and despond.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Both are alienated by veering between over-enthusiasm and despond.

auth_sentence.content: However grounded in reality, self-righteousness rarely leads to clear thinking about the way out of a slough of despond.
auth_sentence.res_content: However grounded in reality, self-righteousness rarely leads to clear thinking about the way out of a slough of despond.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: However grounded in reality, self-righteousness rarely leads to clear thinking about the way out of a slough of despond.

auth_sentence.content: If the left emerged triumphant from the slough of despond in barely a year, there's no reason the right can't do it too.
auth_sentence.res_content: If the left emerged triumphant from the slough of despond in barely a year, there's no reason the right can't do it too.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: If the left emerged triumphant from the slough of despond in barely a year, there's no reason the right can't do it too.

stems_affixes.word_buile: despond[v.失望]+ent……的→adj.失望的,意气消沉的
spont=spond承诺,允诺+aneous……的→自内心的承诺

stems_affixes.value_cn: 通信,信件;[with]符合;[to]相当于,对应
stems_affixes.word_buile: correspond[v.通信;符合]+ence表名词→n.通信,信件;[with]符合;[to]相当于,对应

stems_affixes.value_cn: 被告;回答者;反应; 反射
stems_affixes.word_buile: respond[v.回答,响应,作出反应]+ent……的→回答的人→被告
respond[[v.回答,响应,作出反应]]省鷑.回答,响应,反应
cor共同+respond反应→共同反应→相互通信
de去掉+spond承诺,允诺→不再承诺→失望
re回+spond承诺,允诺→承诺回去→回答
